actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to provide that one-third of the funds for committee staff under primary and additional expense resolutions be allocated to the minority.

summary.text: Amends rules XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to direct that no less than one-third of the funds for committee staff under primary and additional expense resolutions be allocated to minority party members.

titles.title: Resolution to provide that one-third of the funds for committee staff under primary and additional expense resolutions be allocated to the minority.
